scenario_description: Advanced test covering counterparty change, legal domicile shift, liability reallocation, and clause operations

requirements: Replace all entity name variations throughout document
Update signature blocks and contact information
Maintain grammatical consistency (e.g., 'HBL's' becomes 'Digital Finance Corp's')

update_requirements: Change governing law from Hong Kong to Singapore
Update dispute resolution from HKIAC to SIAC (Singapore International Arbitration Centre)
Change arbitration venue from Hong Kong to Singapore
Update all Hong Kong references to Singapore

update_core_definitions.HBL: Digital Finance Corp (Singapore company registration number 202301234A), a company incorporated under the laws of Singapore

add_new_definitions.Singapore Regulations: means the regulations issued by the Monetary Authority of Singapore from time to time

shift_liability_from_to.description: Reverse indemnification - Client now indemnifies Digital Finance Corp instead of vice versa
shift_liability_from_to.new_clause_text: Digital Finance Corp shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Client and its affiliates from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, costs, and expenses arising from Digital Finance Corp's breach of this Agreement or violation of applicable laws.

shift_liability_from_to.description: Remove Client's liability limitations and impose on Digital Finance Corp
shift_liability_from_to.new_clause_text: The Client's total liability to Digital Finance Corp shall not exceed the amount of fees paid by Digital Finance Corp to the Client in the twelve months preceding the claim.

add_clauses.title: 7.3 Data Protection
add_clauses.required_text: Digital Finance Corp shall comply with all applicable data protection laws in Singapore, including the Personal Data Protection Act 2012. All personal data collected shall be processed in accordance with Singapore privacy regulations.

add_clauses.title: 7.4 Regulatory Compliance
add_clauses.required_text: Digital Finance Corp acknowledges that it is subject to the supervision of the Monetary Authority of Singapore and shall maintain all required licenses and registrations under Singapore law.

delete_clauses.text_to_remove: The Client shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless HBL and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, costs, and expenses (including reasonable legal fees) arising from or related to the Client's breach of this Agreement as referenced in Clause 4.1 or violation of applicable laws.

modify_clauses.old_text: HBL shall not be liable to the Client for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages
modify_clauses.new_text: The Client shall not be liable to Digital Finance Corp for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages
modify_clauses.rationale: Reverse liability limitation from company to client

transform_roles.description: Digital Finance Corp becomes the party receiving services rather than providing them

update_company_details.new_address: 1 Raffles Place, #40-02, One Raffles Place, Singapore 048616

counterparty_transformation.description: Transform the counterparty while maintaining legal validity

jurisdiction_transformed.description: Governing law and venue properly changed to Singapore

liability_reallocation_correct.description: Liability clauses properly reversed between parties

clause_operations_successful.description: Clauses added, deleted, and modified as specified

legal_coherence_maintained.description: Document maintains legal consistency and enforceability
